Question: In 2010, this person released her eighth fragrance, Radiance.
Hints: Femme Fatale became this person's first album in which three of its songs reached the top ten of the chart.
As a response, this person wrote the ballad "Everytime" with her backing vocalist and friend Annet Artani.
The April 1999 cover of Rolling Stone featured this person lying on her bed, clad with a bra, shorts and an open top.
